comments:
20020412
if i forget to close my run-time workbench and try to start eclipse again,
i should see an _information_ message box asking me to close it 
(it used to be a nice message in the launch wizard).

now, i get an _error_ message box saying that 'an exception occurred on 
launching' and a stack trace is dumped to the log

1. error messages should be solely for internal problems
2. it should handle this very common case in a friendlier way

<log-entry date="Tue Apr 16 14:31:08 GMT+02:00 2002">

Active tracking of launched instances is removed in PDE due to issues when 
launced instance is terminated abnormally.

traces.message: You must close the run-time workbench  before proceeding.
